com.mellanox.jxio

Interface ServerSession.Callbacks

  • Enclosing class:
    ServerSession

    public static interface ServerSession.Callbacks

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMsgError(Msg msg, EventReason reason)
      This event is triggered if there is an error in Msg send/receive
      void onRequest(Msg msg)
      This event is triggered when a request from Client is received.
      void onSessionEvent(EventName session_event, EventReason reason)
      There are several types of session events: SESSION_CLOSED(because user called ServerSession.close(), Client initiated close or because of an internal error), SESSION_ERROR (due to internal error)

    • Method Detail

      • onRequest

        void onRequest(Msg msg)
        This event is triggered when a request from Client is received. Server should send the reply on the same Msg object.
        Parameters:
        msg - containing Client's request

      • onSessionEvent

        void onSessionEvent(EventName session_event,
                  EventReason reason)
        There are several types of session events: SESSION_CLOSED(because user called ServerSession.close(), Client initiated close or because of an internal error), SESSION_ERROR (due to internal error)
        Parameters:
        session_event -
        reason -
